The current COVID: 19 survival rate in the U.S. is not 98.54%, as claimed in the Facebook post. This information is constantly changing in an ongoing pandemic.
Mortality rates and survival rates vary: It is important to note that not everyone with the disease is getting tested, which affects the accuracy of the statistics.
A 98: 54% survival rate may sound optimistic, but it actually implies that COVID-19 is about 10 times more lethal than the seasonal flu.
The figures provided in the claim are un: It is crucial to rely on reliable sources and understand that the calculations include individuals who are still sick and have neither died nor recovered.
